ygData.subject: I think I found enough volunteers. Thank you all!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to everyone who responded to my call for volunteers. The response was incredible. I will be emailing a select few to conduct interviews with. If I do
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks to everyone who responded to my call for volunteers. The response
was incredible. I will be emailing a select few to conduct interviews with. If I do
not contact you please do not be offened. I wish I could interview everyone
who responded, but there just isn't enough time. Thanks again.

Andrew Haywood

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "M" <harshdragon@y...> wrote:
> Since I verified you are indeed a student where you say you are,
> sure I will help ya in whatever you need. E-mail addy is
> harshdragon@y...
>
> Drago
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "haywoodandrew"
> <haywoodandrew@y...> wrote:
> > Hi all,
> >
> > This is an odd request, but I am looking for some Everquest
> players that
> > wouldn't mind being interviewed either by IM, phone, or if
> practical in person. I
> > am a graduate student at the Institute of Design at Illinois
> Institute of
> > Technology in Chicago. For one of my classes, entitled Observing
> Users, we
> > have to study a product and its users. Our group chose Everquest
> because we
> > think that it is very interesting and complex. As a retired online
> gamer I know
> > how much fun and involving the games can be. In fact, I am very
> tempted to
> > jump into Everquest, but I am worried that I may lose
> concentration on my
> > studies. If anyone is willing to devote a little of their time to
> helping us out we
> > would really appreciate it. Unfortunately, we are poor grad
> students and will
> > not be able to compensate anyone who helps us out, but we will
> very very
> > thankful. Thanks
> >
> > Andrew Haywood
